intro.text: The wind carries sand and ash across the broken highway. Somewhere ahead, a radio crackles—one weak signal in a dead world.

ending_good_scavenge.text: You find water sealed in glass and a blade still sharp enough to matter. In the wasteland, small wins are how people stay alive long enough to hope.

ending.summary: You secure supplies and earn a fighting chance.

ending_ambiguous_signal.text: You walk toward the signal until the static becomes almost words. Either it’s a survivor… or a trap built from memory.

ending.summary: You commit to the unknown. The wasteland doesn’t reward certainty.
